promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word pokemon name for a massive rare horse steel-type wearing a ornate mask. It can be found in desert-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon or steel. Ony answer with the generated name:
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Mystikos, a massive rare horse steel-type pokemon. It can be found in desert-like environments It has the following abilities: anchor-shot. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the word horse or steel or the ability names. Use a maximum of 50 characters:
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of steel-type pokemon, horse-like, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, metallic ambient lighting
generatedDescription: Mystikos lurks in desert lands, its massive size a deterrent for foes. With anchor-shot, nothing escapes its grasp.
